user_query: I'm developing a personal finance app and need access to the list of supported banks and the names of the fields needed to draw a login form similar to the bank's original for all the supported banks in Italy. Additionally, I want to retrieve all the categories retrieved by Afterbanks own categorizer for Italy.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of supported banks in Italy for the personal finance app.
For each supported bank, retrieve the names of the fields needed to draw a login form similar to the bank's original.
Retrieve all the categories provided by Afterbanks' categorizer for Italy.
